title: Devdas
occurrences: Devdas is running away, sir. - Devdas! Where are you going?

... was torn to pieces by Devdas. - His pranks are getting worse!
Devdas's. - Won't he get angry?

l hear Devdas is here.

lsn't that Devdas's voice? - Yes.

Devdas! When did you come?

ls Devdas here? - Yes, but he's sleeping.

l'm suffocating, Devdas.

Who? - Devdas, from your village.
